content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=5.5, y=21.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (x=5.5, y=21.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-1.5, y=24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- PipeGroup connecting various positions including (x=-9.5, y=23.5), (x=-8.5, y=23.5), (x=-7.5, y=23.5), (x=-6.5, y=23.5), and others

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=10.0, y=0.0) with iron-ore input and iron-plate output
- Furnace at position (x=13.0, y=0.0) with iron-ore input and iron-plate output
- Furnace at position (x=16.0, y=0.0) with iron-ore input and copper-plate output
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=8.5, y=0.5), (x=17.5, y=0.5), (x=19.5, y=0.5), and (x=20.5, y=0.5) for transferring materials between furnaces

### Science Lab at Position (x=unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab with input for automation science packs and currently researching logistics
- Connected to the electricity network via the steam engine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Ensure the target tile for placing pipes is unoccupied before attempting to place a pipe. Remove any existing entities at the target position first.

### Errors when Extracting Items from Furnaces
- Verify that the furnace contains the items you wish to extract before attempting extraction. If the furnace is empty or lacks the specific item, the extraction will fail.

### Errors when Inserting Items into Full Inventories
- Check the inventory capacity of the target entity before inserting items. If the inventory is full, insertion will not be possible.

### Errors when Refueling with Insufficient Inventory
- Ensure you have the required fuel in your inventory before attempting to refuel an entity. If the fuel is not available, the refueling action will fail.
